name: Master of Ceremonies
description: Embrace the rustic charm with Rustic Romance. Picture burlap, lace, and the warm glow of candlelight creating a serene atmosphere. We bring the simplicity and beauty of the countryside to your special day, offering rustic-themed planning, barn or outdoor venue selection, rustic decor and styling, vintage-inspired floral arrangements, photography and videography services, and day-of coordination.
